titleStmt.title: A letter of advice to His Excellency the Lord General Monck, tending to the peace and welfare of this nation.
titleStmt.author: Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.
Jennings, Theodore.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan. 31."; "not more weekly news beinge prohibited as Scout Inteligencer &c. more weekly news as Scouts Inteligen: & as prohibited".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
